ctx: intros f g n x H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros f g n x H1 H2. destruct n. - apply H2. - simpl in *. destruct H2 as [IH|IH]. + left. apply Derive_n_correct in IH. rewrite Derive_n_ext_loc in IH. auto. + right. apply ex_derive_n_ext_loc in IH. auto.
